          <title>
            <string language="hu">Tükröző vízfelület</string>
            <string language="en">mirroring water surface</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Widerspiegeln der Wasseroberfläche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">refléter la surface de l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">espelhando a superfície da água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rispecchiare la superficie dell'acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">να αντανακλάσει την επιφάνεια ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reflejo de la superficie del agua</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tó felszínén tükröződik a távoli hegy</string>
            <string language="en">water mirroring mountains </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">fényvisszaverődés,  Fuji,  </string>
            <string language="en">reflection of light,  Fuji,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser, das Berge widerspiegelt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'eau reflétant des montagnes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">água que espelha montanhas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">acqua che rispecchia le montagne</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ύδωρ που αντανακλά τα βουνά</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">agua que refleja las montañas</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion des Lichtes, Fuji,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réflexion de lumière, Fuji,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reflexão da luz, Fuji,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riflessione di luce, Fuji,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντανάκλαση του φωτός, Fuji,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reflexión de la luz, Fuji,</string>
          </keyword>
